0.1.name: wordpress/phpbb-recent-topics
0.1.description: Do you have a phpBB forum, do you want to drag your blog readers into your forum ? Then this plugin might just help, you can include somewhere in wordpress a list of recent phpbb threads (topics) in a page, a post, and even in your theme - so your sidebar for example !
